actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to add approximately 500 miles to the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways for construction of an interstate route to connect Memphis, Tennessee, with Chattanooga, Tennessee, and Atlanta, Georgia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes additional mileage for construction of an interstate route to connect interstate route I-40 in Memphis, Tennessee with interstate route I-24 near Chattanooga, Tennessee, and I-75 between Chattanooga, Tennessee, and Atlanta, Georgia. Amends the Federal-Aid Highway Act of 1956 to authorize the use of funds under such Act for construction of such interstate route.

titles.title: A bill to add approximately 500 miles to the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways for construction of an interstate route to connect Memphis, Tennessee, with Chattanooga, Tennessee, and Atlanta, Georgia, and for other purposes.
